executive_summary: Highly accomplished Senior Software Developer and Developer Department Head with approximately 4 years of experience, including 2 years in leadership, specializing in modern web application development and team management. Proficient in Vue, Nuxt, TypeScript, and Node.js, with a proven track record of leading large-scale platform modernizations (Vue 2.5 to Vue 3, Nuxt 2 to Nuxt 3), introducing critical technologies like TypeScript, and building comprehensive solutions that significantly enhance company value and competitive standing. Adept at leveraging advanced debugging skills and AI agent mastery to accelerate development cycles and ensure high-quality, scalable solutions. Seeking to apply deep technical acumen and leadership prowess to drive innovation and foster high-performing development teams.

contact_information_digital_footprint.professional_title: Senior Software Developer | Developer Department Head

professional_experience.dates_tenure: Approximately 4 years total tenure, with approximately 2 years as Developer Department Head / Leader.
key_responsibilities_achievements: Led the developer department as head for approximately 2 years, overseeing team performance and strategic direction.
Chaired regular team meetings, fostering collaboration and ensuring optimal developer team performance.
Actively participated in the hiring processes, identifying and selecting high-performing developers aligned with company needs.

Spearheaded the comprehensive migration of major applications, including Control Panel and Customer Portal, from Vue 2.5 to the latest Vue 3 version. This modernization effort significantly enhanced platform performance and maintainability, reducing technical debt and improving developer efficiency through modern tooling.

Pioneered the introduction and integration of TypeScript across critical projects, leading to a substantial reduction in runtime errors and a marked improvement in code quality and maintainability. This initiative enhanced team collaboration through improved type safety and code predictability.

Architected and developed the company's front website from scratch using Nuxt 2, subsequently leading its conversion to a Nuxt 3 application. This upgrade improved website performance, user experience, and potentially contributed to enhanced search engine visibility.

Developed several comprehensive and leading projects, including a Call SDP manipulation software for SIP calls, a browser-based database management solution utilizing WebAssembly (WASM), and an IDE facilitating app creation and extensions within ConnexCS resources. These projects streamlined operations, introduced new capabilities, and provided significant value by automating complex processes and enabling internal innovation.
Implemented Service Workers for key web applications, enabling robust offline functionality and improving perceived performance, thereby enhancing user experience and application reliability.
Actively involved in bug fixes, significantly contributing to the stability and reliability of applications.
Implemented robust testing frameworks using Vitest for unit tests and Cypress for end-to-end testing, enhancing software quality and reducing critical bug occurrences.
Conducted rigorous code reviews, ensuring adherence to coding standards and fostering high-quality code delivery across the team.
Proactively researched and integrated cutting-edge technologies, such as VueFlow, to enhance existing features and explore new capabilities.

Investigated and implemented methods to leverage AI for enhancing existing features, particularly in the analysis of logging data like call SIP traces. This initiative aimed to reduce diagnostic time for complex call issues and improve data-driven decision-making.

professional_experience.dates_tenure: Prior to ConnexCS, after Dephlex (specific dates not provided).
key_responsibilities_achievements: Developed an e-commerce website for Zambian users utilizing the Dokan WordPress plugin.
Gained invaluable experience in full project lifecycle management, including planning, development, and resource allocation for a startup venture.
Acquired critical understanding of the immense resources and meticulous preparation required for project success, learning directly from the challenges of limited funding and rapid project failure.

professional_experience.dates_tenure: Prior to self-employment and ConnexCS (specific dates not provided).
key_responsibilities_achievements: Contributed to various web development projects within a professional agency setting.
Developed foundational skills in web development, laying the groundwork for subsequent career progression.

connexcs_internal_projects.name: Call SDP Manipulation Software
connexcs_internal_projects.description: Developed a critical software solution for manipulating Session Description Protocol (SDP) for SIP calls, streamlining complex call processing and potentially reducing manual configuration time.

connexcs_internal_projects.name: Browser-based Database Management Software
connexcs_internal_projects.description: Engineered a sophisticated database management application accessible directly in the browser, leveraging WebAssembly (WASM) for high performance and efficiency.

connexcs_internal_projects.name: IDE for App Creation/Extensions
connexcs_internal_projects.description: Built an integrated development environment that empowers users to create applications and extensions utilizing ConnexCS resources, fostering an ecosystem of internal innovation.

connexcs_internal_projects.name: Drag and Drop Call Flow Builder
connexcs_internal_projects.description: Created an intuitive drag-and-drop interface for building call flows, significantly simplifying a complex operational task and improving user efficiency.

connexcs_internal_projects.name: Service Workers Implementation
connexcs_internal_projects.description: Successfully integrated Service Workers into major web applications, enhancing user experience through improved performance and offline capabilities.

open_source_contributions.role_impact: Key contributor responsible for converting the project to TypeScript, implementing the unit testing infrastructure using Vitest, and maintaining stringent coding standards. Enhanced code robustness, maintainability, and test coverage for a critical open-source component.
Previously contributed by answering questions, demonstrating active community engagement, mentorship, and a willingness to share knowledge.

open_source_contributions.description: Showcases early, beginner-level projects (e.g., Wiki Search), illustrating a foundational learning journey and an early passion for coding and continuous self-improvement.

self_directed_learning.details: Acquired expertise in data structures and full-stack web development, solidifying his capabilities as a Full Stack Developer proficient with tools like Docker, Make, and Devcontainers/Codespaces.
Possesses a unique ability to quickly learn and integrate new skills, enabling the rapid transformation of concepts into functional products, regardless of the underlying technology stack.

Grounded in strong Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles from studies in Java, C, and C++, providing a comprehensive understanding of data processing and conceptualization across diverse programming languages.
